job.command:
# pushd /global/project/projectdirs/star/pwg/starhf/simkomir/LambdaC/CutsOptimization > /dev/null set baseDir=/global/project/projectdirs/star/pwg/starhf/simkomir/LambdaC/CutsOptimization cp -r -L ${baseDir}/simCutsMaker . cp ${baseDir}/runSimCutsMaker.sh . ln -s ${baseDir}/bgSelectedAllStat.root
starver pro # kKstarProton=0, kLambda1520Pion=1, kDeltaPPkaon=2, kPionKaonProton=3, kLambdaPion=4, kKshortProton=5 ./runSimCutsMaker.sh &first; &last;
mv bgCutsPlots*.root ${baseDir}/prod
# popd > /dev/null
